attributes.action: introduce legislation to prevent children from being unfairly discriminated against.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Should shops be allowed to display signs saying "No more than 2 children in the shop at any one time"? Should hotels be allowed to turn away customers because they have a child? Would we accept this if the grounds for this discrimination were based on ethnicity or gender? What message does this send out to the children in our society about how we value them? Please sign this petition and stop discrimination against children NOW!
